summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to real property known as Discovery Park and the laying off of portions of the park roadways within Discovery Park known as Utah Street, Washington Avenue, California Avenue, Iowa Street, Lawtonwood Road, Illinois Avenue, Texas Way, Bay Terrace Road, Idaho Avenue and 45th Avenue West, as public park boulevards; amending Appendices I and II to Ordinance 117569 and to Title 15 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Description and Maps of Park Drives and Boulevards); and naming the portions of Washington Avenue and Utah Street so laid off as Discovery Park Boulevard.
